This hotel in Bali, Indonesia is simply magnificent. Located in the middle of the rainforest you will make one with the nature.

Peru is a dream destination for hiking and trekking, perfect if you are looking for an active vacation.

content.post_title: Best activities to do in Sri Lanka
content.post_content:
With diverse landscapes spread across the different regions of Sri Lanka, there is something for everyone. The list of activities can be quite exhaustive so we picked our top 5. Don't forget to contact us if you want to experience it!

  1. Hike Little Adams Peak
  2. Climb Sigiriya Rock
  3. Ride the Kandy to Ella Train
  4. Safari in Kaudulla National Park
  5. Surf at Hikkaduwa Beach
With over 1500 hotels in Santorini, Greece, it can be really hard to find the perfect gem. Having said that, we managed to find it. The views of the Mediterranean Sea are simply wonderful.
